      • getServer

        protected SchedulerServer getServer​(Config runtime,
                                    IScheduler scheduler,
                                    int port)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Get the http server for receiving scheduler requests
        Parameters:
        runtime - the runtime configuration
        scheduler - an instance of the scheduler
        port - the port for scheduler to listen on
        Returns:
        an instance of the http server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runScheduler

        public boolean runScheduler()
        Run the scheduler. It is a blocking call, and it will return in 2 cases: 1. The topology is requested to kill 2. Unexpected exceptions happen
        Returns:
        true if scheduled successfully
